packs.name: Eldritch Horror
packs.description: The obligatory C'thulhu expansion. Lose your *Sanity in order to exploit newfound *Lunacy.
packs.author: MichaelMayhem

packs.name: Dark Souls
packs.description: A Dark Souls themed pack based around self-debuff synergies.
packs.author: Doodle

packs.name: Gate 2: Conjuration
packs.description: Cards portalled in from other games! Conjure cards & tokens rapidly to overwhelm your foe.
packs.author: MichaelMayhem
packs.credits:
Cards featured from the games:
Gordian Quest
Tower Tactics Liberation
Griftlands
Roguebook
Monster Train

Check them all out on Steam!

packs.name: Gate 3: Life & Death
packs.description: Cards portalled in from other games! Self-inflict damage for potent effects, and heal up what you've lost.
packs.author: MichaelMayhem
packs.credits:
Cards featured from the games:
One Step From Eden
Tower Tactics Liberation
Monster Train
Inscryption
Storybook Brawl

Check them all out on Steam!

packs.name: Downfall
packs.description: A potent pack featuring a card from each of the Spire’s Bosses.
packs.author: Downfall Team

packs.name: Entropy
packs.description: Discard what you don't need, and what you do.
packs.author: Alchyr

packs.name: Frosty Fun
packs.description: A pack focused around Frost Orbs and *Freezing cards, a new mechanic which lets you save them for later.
packs.author: MichaelMayhem

packs.name: Fueled
packs.description: Burn your cards to ash in order to fuel a powerful offense.
packs.author: Bryan K

packs.name: Grand Opening
packs.description: The beginning is half of every action. Has a focus on Startup and First.
packs.author: Jack Renoson

packs.name: Graveyard
packs.description: A pack for burying your cards... or un-burying them.
packs.author: Charlie

packs.name: Indomitable
packs.description: Stand up to the greatest dangers of the Spire with flexible and synergistic defense.
packs.author: modargo

packs.name: The Swarm
packs.description: Bug out with the new Infest keyword, which makes cards burrow into your draw pile!
packs.author: Vex

packs.name: Instant Death
packs.description: Aspire towards idealistic fantasy for excessive force.
packs.author: Alchyr

packs.name: Into the Breach
packs.description: Use powerful mech-based weaponry from the future to dispatch the Spire's threats.
packs.author: Enbeon
packs.credits: Into the Breach originally created by Subset Games

packs.name: Intrigue
packs.description:
Partake in spire's deadliest pasttime - politics.
Effects that center around card rarity.
packs.author: AlexMdle

packs.name: Jockey
packs.description: Ride Horse cards to make a deadly megaturn.
packs.author: Vex

packs.name: Shock'n'Lock
packs.description: Lock onto your enemies and unleash the Unlimited Power of lightning!
packs.author: Jedi

packs.name: Magnetize
packs.description: Randomly spread Magnetized through your cards, and turn your deck into an energy generator.
packs.author: wavewhyse☆

packs.name: Mari's Debuffs
packs.description: Grow beyond your deepest vulnerabilities.
packs.author: iryan0702

packs.name: Meta
packs.description: Support booster pack with adequate general synergies.
packs.author: AlexMdle

packs.name: Needlework
packs.description: anniv5:Stitch your cards together and anniv5:Bind your enemies to render them powerless.
packs.author: Alchyr

packs.name: Overwhelming
packs.description: Defy the restrictions of energy.
packs.author: Mixmaw, Alchyr

packs.name: Pick Them All
packs.description: Be rewarded for picking up cards... or pay a price for taking the strongest cards. Build your deck big as can be.
packs.author: modargo

packs.name: Quanta
packs.description: Card pack based on a homebrew card game.
packs.author: AlexMdle

packs.name: Secret Level
packs.description: A pack focusing on Weak, Vulnerable ... and Vexing mysteries to unlock.
packs.author: Vex

packs.name: Sentinel
packs.description: A distant offshoot of the Watcher tribe, who prefer to use Stances and are much less wrathful.
packs.author: MichaelMayhem

packs.name: Serpentine Disciple
packs.description: A disciple of the Reptomancer. Uses Venomous and Cunning stances which focus on applying debuffs.
packs.author: Dayvig

packs.name: The Showman
packs.description: Plan your turns masterfully to Block attacks and put on a grand performance.
packs.author: Dayvig

packs.name: Snecko
packs.description: Unreliable but powerful effects as befitting of our lord.
packs.author: (Gk) Erasels, Pandemonium
packs.credits: Art sourced from the Downfall mod.

packs.name: Spheres
packs.description: A flexible orb-focused pack with two new orbs that apply *Ignite and *Frostbite.
packs.author: modargo

packs.name: Summoner Spells
packs.description: A League of Legends inspired pack centered around holding tons of cards to deal tons of damage.
packs.author: MaybeLater_x
packs.credits: League of Legends originally created by Riot Games

packs.name: Warrior
packs.description: Master multiple damage types to dismantle your opponents.
packs.author: Diamsword

packs.name: Witches Strike
packs.description: Directly activate your orbs abilities, care not for maximum orb slots with the Manifest ability creating more as you channel.
packs.author: Silver
packs.credits: Bayonetta series originally created by Platinum Games for card names and thematic inspiration.

mods.name: The Packmaster Expansion Packs
mods.description: Extension to the Packmaster character mod to add more packs without blowing up the size of the main mod.
